description: The goal of the isrhostinfo project is to enumerate security-significant Red Hat host application configuration data and send that data via syslog to an enterprise log server for analysis and monitoring. The project includes binaries for the RHEL7 and RHEL8 distros, python3 source code for RHEL6 support, bash helper scripts and the .yml configurations to enable another individual or organization to modify the source code and build organization-specific rpms through Gitlab and open-source CentOS Docker images.
name: rhelhostinfo
